body_html:
OK, reading @colesbury's comments, it makes sense that we're not going to touch the actual THNN/THCUNN bindings in ATen for now. Sorry about the confusion!

@colesbury So, the reason I originally thought we should also fix those bindings, was that I was a bit irritated with how the THNN bindings were taking up "valuable namespace" that I wanted to use for the native ATen functions I am porting. I guess I will have to figure out how to enable identifier renaming from the nn parsing code now...

I guess I will have to figure out how to enable identifier renaming from the nn parsing code now...
body:
OK, reading @colesbury's comments, it makes sense that we're not going to touch the actual THNN/THCUNN bindings in ATen for now. Sorry about the confusion!

@colesbury So, the reason I originally thought we should also fix those bindings, was that I was a bit irritated with how the THNN bindings were taking up "valuable namespace" that I wanted to use for the native ATen functions I am porting. I guess I will have to figure out how to enable identifier renaming from the nn parsing code now...
